StockDaily.Query: select Symbol,AverageDailyVolume,FiftyDayMovingAverage,TwoHundredDayMovingAverage,Open,PreviousClose,BookValue,DaysLow,DaysHigh,YearLow,YearHigh from yahoo.finance.quotes where symbol in ({0})

StockPeriodic.Query: select Symbol,DividendPayDate,ExDividendDate,DividendShare,EarningsShare,EBITDA,MarketCapitalization,EPSEstimateCurrentYear,EPSEstimateNextYear,EPSEstimateNextQuarter,OneyrTargetPrice from yahoo.finance.quotes where symbol in ({0})

StockQuote.Query: select Symbol,LastTradeTime,Ask,Bid,LastTradePriceOnly,Volume from yahoo.finance.quotes where symbol in ({0})

Stock.Query: select Symbol,Name,CurrencyCode,StockExchange from yahoo.finance.quotes where symbol in ({0})
